title: Conn. girl found dead was allegedly starved for weeks by mother, mother’s boyfriend
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The girl's mother, who is facing a murder charge, allegedly told her sister that her daughter died in September of 2024 after two weeks of starvation.
Jacqueline “Mimi” Torres-Garcia.

title: Findings from official report on Fall River assisted living fire praises response, but flags major staffing concerns

bullets: Local News “This incident stands as a testament to the strength of coordination and teamwork among the city’s public safety departments,” the report said.

title: Watch: An emotional Brad Marchand receives video tribute, ovation in return to TD Garden
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins With tears in his eyes, Brad Marchand saluted the crowd amid an extended ovation on Causeway Street.
Brad Marchand was emotional as he received an extended ovation from the TD Garden crowd.

ESPN Sixteen years to the day after Brad Marchand made his NHL debut with the Bruins at TD Garden, the 37-year-old veteran returned to Causeway Street — albeit in a different sweater this time around.

title: Man sentenced to prison for kidnapping girl, throwing her off bridge in Worcester
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Crime Joshua Hubert, of Worcester, was sentenced to at least 28 years in prison after kidnapping, strangling, and throwing a 7-year-old girl off a bridge.
Joshua Hubert seated in a court room at his dangerousness hearing in 2017 on charges related to the kidnapping of a 7-year-old girl.
At right was his attorney Richard Welsh Jr.

title: A question about the possible inspiration for a newer car’s design
author: John Paul
bullets: How To John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, answers a question from a reader wondering if a recent Hyundai’s design was inspired by a 1958 Packard.
The Car Doctor answers a question from a reader wondering if a recent Hyundai’s design was inspired by a 1958 Packard.

title: Man in inflatable Trump suit says he was attacked on his way to North Shore ‘No Kings’ rally
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News The victim was reportedly holding an American flag and wearing an inflatable Trump costume.

By Sana Muneer October 21, 2025 | 6:15 PM 1 minute to read A Lynn man allegedly attacked a man wearing an inflatable costume of President Donald Trump while the victim was on his way to a “No Kings” rally in Swampscott on Saturday, NBC10 Boston reported.

bullets: Local News “A lot of them know what’s happening, but they just choose to look the other way.

title: What Joe Mazzulla said about rumors of Knicks trying to poach him from Celtics
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics "There's only team that I want to coach.
That's the Boston Celtics.

" Joe Mazzulla AP Photo/Charles Krupa According to longtime NBA insider Marc Stein, the Knicks spent some time looking into whether or not there was a way they could pry Joe Mazzulla away from the Celtics during the offseason.
